item.title: Screenshot with Markdown and Vim Using Scrot
item.author: Author
item.description: Screenshot with Vim In this post I will show you the easiest way I could come up with for taking screenshots and inserting them to a markdown file while taking notes using Neo(vim). The title maybe confusing as I couldn’t come up with a shorter title myself. If you could come up with a shorter title please contact me. I faced this problem while I was taking notes through my playing of CTFs and doing pentests.
